Poorly staffed under renovation so only 1 elevator running for guests and employees
The hotel is undergoing a renovation to a post trendy styling that is a bit funky

there were internal renovations going on imagine waking up to the sound of jackhammers

1: Stylish new remodel does not cover up flaws
Stayed two nights at their newly remodeled room
As far as the hotel goes it has been remodeled and checks the boxes for what you would expect from a Sheraton clean and fairly roomy
The hotel is clean and somewhat updated but not anything special
updated room was nice and very easy to park plus very friendly staff
Rooms are renovated amenities are ok
Nicely remodeled older Sheraton in a great central Pasadena location
